entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.2°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
